item.title: Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
The amazing Good Smile Company is celebrating their 20th anniversary! With New York Comic Con marking its return to live events at the Javtis Center, Good Smile Company is set to launch their new figure line titled, “HELLO! GOOD SMILE”! New York Comic Con Booth So come stop by and say hello to Good Smile …

The post Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The amazing Good Smile Company is celebrating their 20th anniversary! With New York Comic Con marking its return to live events at the Javtis Center, Good Smile Company is set to launch their new figure line titled, “HELLO! GOOD SMILE”!

New York Comic Con Booth

So come stop by and say hello to Good Smile Company at their booth, #1419! You’ll be able to preview the latest Nendoroid, POP UP PARADE, and figma sculpts. This is a must-see for anyone interested in collecting figures of all shapes, sizes, and types of various characters from their favorite anime and video games.

HELLO! GOOD SMILE: Hatsune Miku

And for the Vocaloid enthusiasts like ourselves, we’re happy to say the adorable Hatsune Miku is going to be released as a part of the HELLO! GOOD SMILE line in a special ice cream-themed display! You’ll also get the opportunity to take home a special HELLO! GOOD SMILE themed keychain.

NYCC 2021 Exclusive

Additionally, Good Smile Company will have a limited quantity of special Naruto Nendoroid Pin (Black & White Version) available for purchase!

Other character goods from series such as Cardcaptor Sakura, Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure, and My Hero Academia are also going to be available, alongside merchandise from For Fans By Fans. Make sure to take a look while supplies last!

This year, New York Comic Con will run from October 7-10, 2021, at the Jarvis Center.
For tickets, check out https://www.newyorkcomiccon.com/ !

Good Smile Company Links

Instagram

Twitter

Facebook

Youtube

The post Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021 appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Hatsune Miku V4X Nendoroid Announced
item.dc:creator: Momoi
item.description:
Good Smile Co. just revealed Hatsune Miku’s latest nendoroid! While her V4X design inspired both a figma and 1/7 scale statue, she now has a nendoroid on the way! The articulated chibi collectible is currently available to pre-order. Features and Details According to Good Smile Company, the Hatsune Miku V4X nendoroid will have lots of …

The post New Hatsune Miku V4X Nendoroid Announced appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Co. just revealed Hatsune Miku’s latest nendoroid! While her V4X design inspired both a figma and 1/7 scale statue, she now has a nendoroid on the way! The articulated chibi collectible is currently available to pre-order.

Features and Details

According to Good Smile Company, the Hatsune Miku V4X nendoroid will have lots of unique assets! For one thing, the figure stands out with the distinct, angular shape of her twin tails. Where other versions of Miku have her hair in one long, smooth and soft-looking piece each, this version highlights the “sharper”, more dynamic ends that iXima used for her V4 update.

Not only that, but the translucent socks and sleeves are an added detail, along with her hair pieces that are solid pink rather than the black diamonds with the pink light in the center.

Aside from the initial unique details, the figure will come with lots of additional pieces!

For example, Good Smile reported that the figure will have three face plates/expressions. She will have: “A standard expression, a smiling expression, and a starry-eyed expression filled with curiosity”.

In addition, this nendoroid includes two optional parts; a guitar and a pair of glasses! Several extra hand pieces with different poses will be included, which will allow for maximum pose-ability for Miku’s newest figure!

Pre-order and Release

As of now, the Hatsune Miku V4X nendoroid is available for pre-order via the Good Smile Japanese website for 5,500 JPY.

It is also available on the Good Smile US store for 52.99 USD, and Tokyo Otaku Mode for 55.99 USD.

There is no set release date beyond October 2020, however a more specific date will be nailed down in the future.

We’ll keep you posted here, so be sure to check back for the latest updates!

Sources

Good Smile official announcement
Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), YouTube and Weibo

The post New Hatsune Miku V4X Nendoroid Announced appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Preorders Now Open!
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
With the end of Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019’s preseale of the Magical Mirai 2018 ver. Nendoroid, that means online preorders are now open! Miku from Magical Mirai 2018 has arrived! From “Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku” comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku wearing her outfit from the Magical Mirai 2018 main visual illustration! …

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Preorders Now Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With the end of Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019’s preseale of the Magical Mirai 2018 ver. Nendoroid, that means online preorders are now open!

Miku from Magical Mirai 2018 has arrived!
From “Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku” comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku wearing her outfit from the Magical Mirai 2018 main visual illustration! Illustrator Mika Pikazo’s colorful and upbeat version of Miku has been brought to life.

She comes with three face plates including an energetic standard expression, a smiling expression and a winking expression often seen during concerts! Her school uniform themed outfit has been perfectly recreated in Nendoroid size. Her megaphone mic decorated with a cube and balloons is included. Both a stand type and handheld megaphone are included allowing for various different poses. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Preorders for this nendoroid will be available from Good Smile Company’s online shop until October 3rd at 12:00 PM JST, and has a price of 5,093 JPY ($48.99 USD). The expected shipping period is around February 2020.

Check out more photos by Kahotan on her review of the figure! → https://mikatan.goodsmile.info/en/2019/08/30/nendoroid-hatsune-miku-magical-mirai-2018-ver/

> Nendoroid Product page
> Nendoroid Preorder page

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Preorders Now Open! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Announced For Presale at Magical Mirai 2019
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Good Smile Company has announced Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. for presale at the upcoming Magical Mirai 2019 in Osaka and Tokyo! Attendees will be able to grab this adorable nendoroid in-person before the online preorders go live on September 2nd, 2019! The colorful school outfit design by Mika Pikazo is faithfully preserved …

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Announced For Presale at Magical Mirai 2019 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Company has announced Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. for presale at the upcoming Magical Mirai 2019 in Osaka and Tokyo! Attendees will be able to grab this adorable nendoroid in-person before the online preorders go live on September 2nd, 2019!

The colorful school outfit design by Mika Pikazo is faithfully preserved in nendoroid form, and comes with 3 face plates, two megaphones and balloons as accessories to allow various creative poses.

She’s priced at 5,093 Yen ($48.99 USD), and will be sold at Good Smile Company’s booths at Magical Mirai 2019 in Osaka on August 9th~11th, and Tokyo on August 30th~September 1st. We’ll make a post at a later time when online preorders go live! Online preorders will ship in February 2020, so get yours 6 months early at the event if you can!

Product Details: https://www.goodsmile.info/en/product/8513/
Magical Mirai 2019 Official Site: https://magicalmirai.com/2019/

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Announced For Presale at Magical Mirai 2019 appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku 2020 Design Finalists Announced, Voting Website Launched & Livestream Summary
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Good Smile Company’s “Snow Miku Time” livestream event has finished, and has a lot of exciting news to share! If you missed the live stream event, you can rewatch the YouTube recording for as long as it’s available. Let’s get started on the announcements! Even though it was the last part of the live stream, the reveal …

The post Snow Miku 2020 Design Finalists Announced, Voting Website Launched & Livestream Summary appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Company’s “Snow Miku Time” livestream event has finished, and has a lot of exciting news to share! If you missed the live stream event, you can rewatch the YouTube recording for as long as it’s available. Let’s get started on the announcements!

Even though it was the last part of the live stream, the reveal of the Snow Miku and Yukine 2020 design finalists is what everyone was waiting for! Here’s the list of the 6 finalists:

#1: “Grand Piano” by 杏夏蜜柑 → https://piapro.jp/t/saxQ
#2: “Taiko” by こり → https://piapro.jp/t/YxrR
#3: “Horn” by メープル → https://piapro.jp/t/HnGM
#4: “Accordion” by mgr → https://piapro.jp/t/sWBP
#5: “Flute” by 二六時中 → https://piapro.jp/t/lO2m
#6: “Marching Band” by ππ → https://piapro.jp/t/P9Kf

Community voting will be counted until May 17th, JST. Only one vote per person/device will be counted! The winning design will be announced at Magical Mirai 2019.

-> CLICK HERE TO VOTE! <-
Magical Mirai 2019

A new piece of artwork showing off Magical Mirai 2019 themed outfits for Kagamine Rin & Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO and MEIKO were revealed during the livestream. Expect these designs to play part in decorations and goods for Magical Mirai 2019!

The Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 ver. was also announced during the stream! Details regarding pricing and release date were not yet announced, but we can expect to hear more soon.

Racing Miku 2019

Good Smile Company announced a 1/8 scale figure for Racing Miku 2018, based on the art design by Annin Oiko! There’s only a prototype sculpture being teased for now. Expect a painted version to be revealed, along with pricing and release info at a later date.

Good Smile Racing and Nitroplus are collaborating together again this year with Racing Miku and Super Sonico. Two new artworks by Minoa and 津路参汰 were released as part of this collaboration. Other details of the collaboration will come at a later time.

Other Goods & Collabs

A scale figure of Hatsune Miku Symphony 2018~2019 will be made! The figure will be based on the original artwork by Rella. Other details are not yet available, so keep watching for that.

Also, a Hatsune Miku x Macaron collaboration was announced, which will make special Cryptonloid themed Macaroons available, along with an A2 size visual poster!

Lastly, SEGA announced the availability and release dates for the following prize plushies and figures: Hatsune Miku: White Dress ver. plushie (releases 3rd week of May 2019), Hatsune Miku: White Dress ver. premium figure (releases 4th week of May 2019), a new trio of Hatsune Miku keychain plushies (releases 3rd week of June 2019) and Mega Jumbo Fuwafuwa ver. Sakura Miku plushie (on preorder at Chara-Ani until May 28th).

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Snow Miku 2020 Design Finalists Announced, Voting Website Launched & Livestream Summary appeared first on VNN.

She comes with her serious face, motion sickness face, and blushed face, and an array of iconic accessories: a …

The post Kahotan Reviews Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Shinkalion Ver, Preorders Open February 7th appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The twintailed 11-year old pilot of the iconic transforming bullet train anime “Shinkansen Henkei Robo Shinkalion” is finally getting a closer look on her Nendoroid, as Kahotan from Good Smile Company released a photo review on her blog. She comes with her serious face, motion sickness face, and blushed face, and an array of iconic accessories: a pink under rim glasses, a bamboo sword, and a squirrel mascot.

Preorders will open on GOODSMILE ONLINE SHOP from February 7th, with a Tamagozake accessory as a preorder bonus. Additionally, her unit, H5 Hayabusa, will be open for preorder as a MODEROID on the same date.

Check out the photo review on Kahotan’s blog!

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Kahotan Reviews Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Shinkalion Ver, Preorders Open February 7th appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Symphony 2018-2019 ver. Preorders Open
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Great news for Hatsune Miku and Hatsune Miku Symphony lovers! Good Smile Company’s Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Symphony 2018-2019 ver. is now available for preorder! “I wonder if I’m singing well?” From “Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku” comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku based off of the main visual from the full orchestra concert “Hatsune …

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Symphony 2018-2019 ver. Preorders Open appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Great news for Hatsune Miku and Hatsune Miku Symphony lovers! Good Smile Company’s Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Symphony 2018-2019 ver. is now available for preorder!

“I wonder if I’m singing well?”

From “Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku” comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku based off of the main visual from the full orchestra concert “Hatsune Miku Symphony 2018-2019”. The Nendoroid faithfully captures the neat and delicate design, originally illustrated by Rella. She comes with three face plates including a smiling expression, a winking expression and a singing expression!

Using the included melody parts, you can display Miku as though she is singing with the orchestra! Her costume features beautiful ribbons with pink and cyan accents, while her twintails showcase a beautiful gradient. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Preorders are open on Good Smile Company’s online shop from now until January 31st, 2019, with a price of 4700 Yen ($43 USD). Preorders from Good Smile Company’s store will also include an exclusive round base with the Hatsune Miku Symphony stage theme. You can also find the nendoroid available from the other online stores listed below!

Links will be updated as they become available!
> Good Smile Company
> Tokyo Otaku Mode
> CDJapan (Pending)
> Amiami
> Hobby Search
> HLJ (Pending)

Below are some of GSC’s sample photos. You can also check out Kahotan’s photo review from her blog!

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Symphony 2018-2019 ver. Preorders Open appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Cheerful Ver. (2018) Announced To Support Japan Disaster Relief
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Good Smile Company has announced their Cheerful Japan 2018 charity project, which aims to raise fund to aid in Japan’s recovery after the recent earthquake, storm and flood disasters. Joining this campaign is an updated Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Cheerful ver.! (They should have added 2.0 to the name!) Sending the power of smiles! We wish …

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Cheerful Ver. (2018) Announced To Support Japan Disaster Relief appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Company has announced their Cheerful Japan 2018 charity project, which aims to raise fund to aid in Japan’s recovery after the recent earthquake, storm and flood disasters. Joining this campaign is an updated Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Cheerful ver.! (They should have added 2.0 to the name!)

Sending the power of smiles!

We wish to express our condolences to those who have been affected by the disasters that have struck Japan since April 2018.

– 2018 Shimane Earthquake
– 2018 Osaka Earthquake
– July 2018 Floods
– Typhoon Jebi
– 2018 Hokkaido Eastern Iburi Earthquake

We want to work with our fans to bring back the cheer to Japan by bringing back the ‘Cheerful JAPAN!’ charity project, to help raise funds to aid relief efforts in affected areas. This product is released as a joint charity project with Crypton Future Media.

Using Nendoroid Hatsune Miku 2.0 as a base, she comes with a standard expression, excited expression and a cheering expression! For optional parts, a flag, pom-poms and her trusty leek are all included! Special hand and leg parts are also included to put her in her supportive, cheering pose! Together, let’s support the areas affected and cheer on all of Japan! For each figure sold, Crypton Future Media and Good Smile Company will donate ¥1000 to aid the relief efforts in Japan.

The nendoroid is available exclusively through Good Smile Company’s online shop until October 11th, 2018 at 12:00 PM JST, and is priced at 4,000 Yen ($37). She’s expected to ship January 2019!

Good Smile Online Shop → https://goodsmileshop.com/en/p/G_CH_WD_00001

Product Details → http://www.goodsmile.info/en/product/7610/

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Cheerful Ver. (2018) Announced To Support Japan Disaster Relief appeared first on VNN.

Good Smile Company’s live stream event has finished, and there’s quite a bit of news to share! If you missed your chance to watch it live, you can still cast your votes for Snow Miku 2019’s outfit design on the web poll → https://event.goodsmile.info/snowmiku2019/en/index.html Here’s everything we saw announced and revealed during the stream! New …

The post GSC’s Snow Miku Live Stream News, Snow Miku 2019 Online Poll Opened appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Company’s live stream event has finished, and there’s quite a bit of news to share! If you missed your chance to watch it live, you can still cast your votes for Snow Miku 2019’s outfit design on the web poll → https://event.goodsmile.info/snowmiku2019/en/index.html

Here’s everything we saw announced and revealed during the stream!

New Figures, Goods & Reveals

  • Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2017 ver.
  • Nendoroid Racing Miku 2013: Sepang ver.
  • Racing Miku 2017 SPA ver. 1/7 Scale Figure
  • Hatsune Miku: Vintage Dress ver. 1/7 Scale figure
  • “Piyokuru” Product Line Announced
  • Hatsune Miku V4 Chinese ver. GIFT Plushie
  • Tony returns to draw Racing Mku SPA ver. again for 2018

The last part of the stream was of course the long-awaited community vote! There were 6 finalists to choose from.

Finalist #1: RAHWIA – http://piapro.jp/t/liso
Finalist #2: – L F – – http://piapro.jp/t/70Dn
Finalist #3: mgr – http://piapro.jp/t/1oP2
Finalist #4: ermo – http://piapro.jp/t/Mne6
Finalist #5: トバキョーコ – http://piapro.jp/t/e6cX
Finalist #6: 三日 – http://piapro.jp/t/579f

Outfit design #2 by “- L F -” was the live stream vote with 27.5% of viewers voting in the outfit’s favor! However, this was just the first phase of the voting. You can also cast your vote on the official online poll until May 17th JST! → https://event.goodsmile.info/snowmiku2019/en/index.html

Source: Mikufan.com

The post GSC’s Snow Miku Live Stream News, Snow Miku 2019 Online Poll Opened appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Review
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
With Racing Miku 2018 taking center stage this year and her Nendoroid already being up for pre-order, Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 is retiring. However, that doesn’t mean she’s gone yet! There are still a few Racing Miku 2017 Nendoroid to grab over on Tokyo Otaku Mode as well as other figure websites. And considering how …

The post Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Review appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With Racing Miku 2018 taking center stage this year and her Nendoroid already being up for pre-order, Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 is retiring. However, that doesn’t mean she’s gone yet! There are still a few Racing Miku 2017 Nendoroid to grab over on Tokyo Otaku Mode as well as other figure websites. And considering how adorable she is, she’s definitely a must-have! I (Hoshi) have a full review of the figure!

Note: While this article isn’t sponsored, VNN uses affiliate links and gains a small commission from purchases.

First Impressions

I knew that I wanted this Nendoroid the moment I saw the Racing Miku 2017 design, honestly. She was absolutely adorable and just pure perfection. And the Nendoroid definitely doesn’t disappoint. Right out of the box, she’s super cute. She’s honestly one of the cutest Miku figures that I have in my ever growing collection!

Accessories

Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 comes with about the standard amount of accessories for a Nendoroid: Two face plates, a leg bent at the knee, various arm parts, a few extra hands, a trophy (congrats on winning the 2017 SUPERGT Championship!), and a bouquet of flowers. In addition, she also has a nice little race car! The car comes without decals, so prepare to put them on yourself. I’m personally too much of a perfectionist and haven’t tried my hand at the decals yet.

The Car

To fit Miku in the car, just remove her lower half and stick her upper body in the car on the peg provided. She comes with a steering wheel and arms and hands to hold the wheel. Just be careful of what angles you photograph her from! The wheel isn’t connected to the car, so you have to make sure she’s photographed from an angle that doesn’t show this. Unless you’re going for a comedy shot, of course.

The Figure

As mentioned earlier, the figure is adorable. And thanks to her wings, she doesn’t even need a Nendoroid stand! (Which worked out great for me since my stand came missing a part.*) The Nendo itself feels very high quality and overall doesn’t have any glaring issues whatsoever. Her one arm is slightly loose as is her lower body at times, but it was nothing that couldn’t be worked around.

*Note that if you contact GSC about a product that you bought from them or a partner shop, you’ll likely receive a replacement part for anything that came broken. However, they use Registered SAL to ship the parts, and SAL is currently a little bit slower than usual, so the part may take a few weeks to arrive.

Details

It seems like every little detail from the original illustration was preserved in this tiny little chibi! The circuit board design of the wings is so crisp and clear it’s absolutely amazing. All of the logos for GSR and their sponsors are also perfect. And the sculpting and painting for Miku’s hair and accessories is astounding! Each flower looks to be carefully sculpted and the gradient in her hair is just beautiful. Her headphones look just as superb as well. I’m usually the first to find faults with a Nendoroid, but this one doesn’t have many.

The only thing I’d complain about is her skirt and the green ruffles of her shirt. They’re this kind of transparent-but-not type of material that can look incredibly odd in certain lighting. While a light box setup fixes these issues, natural lighting doesn’t always compliment the material.

Bonuses!

Tokyo Otaku Mode is selling the Personal Sponsorship versions of the Nendoroid and figma, so you get bonuses with them as well! I personally bought the 8,000 yen version because I didn’t need all the stuff that comes with the 15,000 yen version. Both come with a Personal Sponsor Card, a Ticket Holder, the Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver., the Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver. Acrylic Keychain Vol. 1, and the Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Ver. Acrylic Keychain Vol. 2. The 15,000 yen version comes with a hand towel and mini pouch as well.

In addition to their intended purpose, the acrylic keychains can be used as decoration as well! They come with little stands that you can place the keychain in so that it can stand up on its own.

Final Thoughts

She’s cute. You need her. In all seriousness, though, she’s definitely a product that I would recommend! Grab her before she’s gone for good!

Where to Buy

You can grab both of the Sponsorship Courses from Tokyo Otaku Mode!

8,000 yen Course: $108.99 USD or $89.37 USD with Premium (Note: Only ten are left as of when this article was written!)

15,000 yen Course: $203.99 USD or $173.39 USD with Premium

Sign up for TOM Premium for an extra $10 off your purchase as well!

And while you’re at it, be sure to grab the Nendoroid Racing Miku 2018 as well! If you’re not interested in sponsoring GSR (which you really should look into doing if you can!), you can order the standard edition at the links below.

TOM | CD Japan | AmiAmi | GSC

The post Nendoroid Racing Miku 2017 Review appeared first on VNN.
